hero7.title: Always know how you're performing
hero7.description: Finely crafted components built with React, Tailwind and Shadcn UI. Developers can copy and paste these blocks directly into their project.

before.title: Before DATAx
points: !!Manual data entry processes were causing significant delays in reporting and analysis timelines.
Teams were struggling to maintain data consistency across multiple spreadsheets and platforms.
Decision-making was hindered by the lack of real-time access to critical business metrics.
Valuable time was wasted reconciling data discrepancies between different department reports.
Security concerns arose from sharing sensitive data through unsecured channels and methods.

after.title: After DATAx
points: Automated data entry processes reduced manual errors and increased data accuracy.
Real-time data synchronization ensures all teams work with the most current information across platforms.
Interactive dashboards provide instant access to key performance metrics for faster decision-making.
Centralized data management eliminated reconciliation needs and improved departmental collaboration.
Enterprise-grade security protocols ensure sensitive data remains protected at all times.
